entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net7.0-iOS] Cannot debug my project with Linker disabled #15703
  • Bug Report: SQLite DateTime Property Not Loaded Correctly in Framework #15701
  • Disable soft / virtual keyboard automatic popping up on Android devices with physical keyboards #15698
  • [net8.0-Windows] [Regression] CollectionView doesn't automatically expand anymore #15697
  • Android publish: error NETSDK1191: A runtime identifier for the property 'SelfContained' couldn't be inferred #15696
  • Adding a bindable Off state Color for Switch #15695
  • Error on archiving .net7.0 for android with target platform ARM32: "Invalid option 'ARM32' for /platform; must be anycpu, x86, Itanium, arm, arm64" #15691

Closed

  • [Windows] Adding and Removing ContextMenus currently does not work #14984
    .NET 8
  • DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator with System.Net.WebRequest #15456
  • FileNotFoundException when I try to get the version of the assembly #15679
  • Unable to scroll to keyboard #14173
    Backlog
  • [AppStartup] MAUI app Startup is slower than Xamarin #15692
  • HorizontalOptions/VerticalOptions property to Frame not working , Android .NET 7.0 #14188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Markdig from 0.23.0 to 0.31.0 #15702
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures

Merged

  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
    area/controls 🎮, control-flyout

Updated

  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItemsSource #15688
    area/collectionview 📃
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15690
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Fix CharacterSpacing on SearchBar on iOS to be actually set #15596
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685
    area/platform
